translate.title: Submit translation documents / Contribute to the translation effort
translate.subtitle: We need you!
translate.q1: How can I obtain the translation file?
translate.a1: We have hosted the translation files on GitHub, and you can visit our i18n repository for more details.
translate.q2: How should I submit the translation file?
translate.a2: You just need to submit a PR in the GitHub repository.
translate.q3: What is the address of the GitHub repository?

work_in_progress: The website/page is still under construction, please be patient!
